Name: Man Wreck
About the game: An imp wants to be promoted into an incubus. He needs to undergo a test: turning a town of men into willing subjects of Hell. This means there are obstacles to clear, and there are a lot of seduction/tricks to be played. An adult visual novel that explores many heavy kinks in gay fantasies, this game faces taboos head on. A simple puzzle system provides some casual fun in between story progressions.
Meta Title: Man Wreck: Oct 24, 2019, Aaron Dodo and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Man Wreck? Check out the release date (Oct 24, 2019), developer insights from Aaron Dodo, and a complete game summary.
